last_episode_to_air.name: The Carlsbad or Bust Bash
last_episode_to_air.overview: And here they are, folks, warming up their cars for the hottest race ever to Carlsbad. Early race favourites include Penelope Pitstop and the Red Max.

name: Wacky Races
overview: The cartoon revolves around several racers with various themes who are each allowed to use strange gimmicks to compete against other racers in many races across the United States.

episodes.name: See-Saw to Arkansas
episodes.overview: On their way to Mustard Spread Arkansas, all the racers get caught up. Penelope Pistop & Ant Hill Mob get lost. Dick Dastardly falls and sinks into mud. Everyone else gets caught up in traffic.

episodes.name: Creepy Trip to Lemon Twist
episodes.overview: On their way to Lemon Twist Nevada, the Wacky Racers run into a deserted town and wonder into a bar where they find ghosts.

episodes.name: Why Oh Why Wyoming
episodes.overview: The Wacky Racers roar across the desert, dashing toward Rock Springs, Wyo. Meanwhile, Dick Dastardly teams up with Indian chief Crazy Buffalo in an attempt to stop the racers in their tracks.

episodes.name: Beat the Clock to Yellow Rock
episodes.overview: On their way to Yellow Rock, the racers are stopped by a ranger to search for missing bears hiding in their trunks. Blubber Bear is mistaken for a runaway so Luke tries hiding him until he gets past the ranger. A bunch of bears take over the Ant Hill Mob and Dick Dastardly's cars.

episodes.name: Mish Mash Missouri Dash
episodes.overview: Dick Dastardly dresses up as a Southener. Luke finds his cousin Elmer.

episodes.name: Idaho a Go Go
episodes.overview: The racers embark on a lap to a little town in Idaho, while Dastardly tries to entrap Penelope Pitstop with a "Little Red Riding Hood" ploy.

episodes.name: The Baja-Ha-Ha Race
episodes.overview: In Mexico, Dick Dastardly and Muttley try to slow the other drivers by using a herd of cow-shaped balloons to block the road.

episodes.name: Real Gone Ape
episodes.overview: Dick Dastardly hypnotizes a gorilla to stop the other racers. The other racers find away around him and again Dick Dastardly finishes last.

episodes.name: Scout Scatter
episodes.overview: The Anthill Mob disguises themselves as Wood Scouts to evade the police.

episodes.name: Free Wheeling to Wheeling
episodes.overview: On their way to Wheeling, WV, Dick Dastardly uses construction cars (bulldozer, steamroller, a crane) to stop the racers.

episodes.name: By Rollercoaster to Upsan Downs
episodes.overview: Dick Dastardly leads the racers into an abandoned amusement park on their way to Upsan Downs.

episodes.name: The Speedy Arkansas Traveller
episodes.overview: On their way to Noah's Ark, AK, Dick Dastardly leads the racers into the War Games right in th middle of the race.

episodes.name: Hot Race at Chillicothe
episodes.overview: Heading to Chillicothe, OH, Dick Dastardly steals a Police car. The Anthill Mob disguises themselves as a little league baseball team and play Baseball against Dick Dastardly and Muttley.

episodes.name: The Wrong Lumber Race
episodes.overview: Dick Dastardly uses trees, logs, and saws to win the race.

episodes.name: Rhode Island Road Race
episodes.overview: Dick Dastardly desperatedly tries to win this race and almost does. He tries a construction site detour, Subway station, Hot sauce, and expanding his wheels.

episodes.name: The Great Cold Rush Race
episodes.overview: Dick Dastardly dresses up as a snow monster to scare everyone away.

episodes.name: Wacky Race to Ripsaw
episodes.overview: Today, the Wacky Racers are zooming up the track from Elbowgrease, Ohio to Ripsaw, Arkansas.

episodes.name: Oils Well That Ends Well
episodes.overview: The next race sees the racers wending their wacky way westward from Oilcan, Oklahoma to Greasegun, Texas.

episodes.name: Whizzin' to Washington
episodes.overview: The Wacky Racers pass by with a thunderous hue and cry on their way to Washington.

episodes.name: The Dipsy Doodle Desert Derby
episodes.overview: From downtown Death Valley to uptown Doomstown, the Wacky Racers compete in the Desert Derby - trying to get a fraction of traction in the sand.

episodes.name: Eeny, Miny Missouri Go!
episodes.overview: Clear the road, step aside and watch those Wacky Racers ride all the way to Eeny Meeny, Missouri.

episodes.name: The Super Silly Swamp Sprint
episodes.overview: The next race takes place from Sandy Soda Springs to Squishy Squash City.

episodes.name: The Dopey Dakota Derby
episodes.overview: The Wacky Racers roar out of Cactus City on the way to Gopher Gulch in the Badlands. Dick Dastardly tries to hold up the Wacky Racers, disguising himself as the same outlaw that he sees on a "Wanted" poster.

episodes.name: Dash to Delaware
episodes.overview: Through the valley and over the dale, the Wacky Racers hit the trail to far off Wott-Will, Delaware. Dick Dastardly sprays cake icing on the road in front of a bakery. Penelope Pitstop and Peter Perfect's cars slide into the bakery, and Penelope and Peter end up dressed as a bride and groom on top of a big wedding cake.

episodes.name: Speeding for Smogland
episodes.overview: Today, we find the Wacky Racers speeding through the mountains toward Jollywood, California.

episodes.name: Race Rally to Raleigh
episodes.overview: Roaring down the highway, the Wacky Racers relentlessly roll along to the finish line at Raleigh.

episodes.name: Ballpoint, Penn. or Bust!
episodes.overview: The cars are strung out on the first lap of today's Wacky Race, with the finish line in far-off Ballpoint, Pennsylvania.

episodes.name: Fast Track to Hackensack
episodes.overview: The racers hurtle toward their next destination in Hackensack.

episodes.name: The Ski Resort Road Race
episodes.overview: Today's Wacky Racers are slipping and sliding through ski resort country from Mush-Mush, Michigan to Iceandsnow, Idaho.

episodes.name: Overseas Hi-Way Race
episodes.overview: Today, our Wacky Race takes place over water, as our Wacky Racers are island-hopping in Florida on their way from Key Largo to Key West.

episodes.name: Race to Racine
episodes.overview: There they go on another wild and wacky race to Racine. Early race favourites include Professor Pat Pending, the Gruesome Twosome, and Rock and Gravel.

episodes.name: The Carlsbad or Bust Bash
episodes.overview: And here they are, folks, warming up their cars for the hottest race ever to Carlsbad. Early race favourites include Penelope Pitstop and the Red Max.
